name: Ochre Jelly
description: A large, amorphous ooze that can dissolve flesh, wood, and metal with ease.
memorable: Its ability to split into smaller jellies upon being hit makes it a challenging foe.
goals: Often lurks in dark places, driven by a hunger for flesh.
relations: May be found in the same environments as other oozes or in underground settings.
environment: Caves, dungeons, or dark, damp areas.
strengths: Can pass through narrow spaces effortlessly and is immune to various conditions.
attacks: Attacks by engulfing its prey and secreting corrosive acid; can grapple foes.
most_powerful_ability: Can split into two smaller oozes when hit by lightning or slashing damage.
senses: Has blindsight up to 60 feet, effectively sensing its environment.
additional_information: Immunities to acid, lightning, and slashing damage.
Can climb difficult surfaces and ceilings without difficulty.
Does not require air or sleep due to ooze nature.
Possesses overwhelming stench that can poison nearby creatures.
Grapples targets and deals ongoing acid damage.
test_queries: large amorphous ooze with corrosive abilities
jelly creature that can split in combat
pseudopod attack of acid jelly monster
monster that thrives in dark, damp environments
